title: AMICULUM
description:
AMICULUM is an independent family of 11 branded agencies that deliver communications and consultancy services to pharmaceutical, biotechnology and health technology companies across the world. What makes us different is our agile and highly collaborative approach, which allows us to put together the right expertise from across our business to deliver high-quality, technically accurate and compelling content for different audiences, through the selective use of key communication channels.

AMICULUM has grown steadily since 2001 with significant repeat business from our clients and recommendations from the leading experts we have worked with. We now have a team of over >350 healthcare communications professionals based in Europe, Asia-Pacific, MENA, and the USA.

services.description: Creation of clinical protocol document which details how a clinical trial is designed, relating to to the methodology, hypothesis, and operation of clinical trial to ensure the safety of the patients is maintained as well as maintaining the integrity of the data collected during the trial.

See also HTA Submission.

title: CNC
description:
Welcome to CNC, a pioneering small business established in 2021 and based in the heart of India, New Delhi. As an innovator in the biomedical sector, we offer a spectrum of services ranging from Biobanking and Clinical Research to Custom Histology and Graphic Design. 

Our pride lies in our unique biobank, a treasure trove filled with meticulously cataloged Formalin-Fixed Paraffin-Embedded (FFPE) blocks. These blocks, rich in genetic insights and accompanied by exhaustive pathology reports, are the cornerstone resources for diverse research studies and diagnostic explorations. 

For those interested in genetic deep-dives, our premium FFPE blocks come with mutation analysis. These specimens are extensively genetically characterized, empowering researchers to explore the complex molecular profiles of each sample. Our state-of-the-art Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) Data Analysis further enhances this research, uncovering hidden genetic intricacies and deepening our understanding of disease mechanisms. 

We also offer specialized FFPE blocks that have undergone Polymerase Chain Reaction (PCR) and Fluorescence In Situ Hybridization (FISH) assays. These specimens provide a focused perspective, facilitating the examination of specific genetic markers and structural modifications with unrivaled precision. 

One of our unique offerings includes tissue specimens, an invaluable resource for longitudinal studies. These allow researchers to correlate molecular shifts in tissue samples with corresponding changes in plasma, thereby providing insights into disease progression and treatment response. 

At CNC, we are passionate about propelling advancements in medical and scientific knowledge. Our diverse collection of high-quality specimens and associated data is curated to accelerate your research endeavors, whether it's cancer research, biomarker discovery or therapeutic development. As a testament to our commitment to quality, we are certified by Good Clinical Practice (GCP). 

Discover the innovative world of CNC, where we catalyze your investigations and drive progress in pathology and beyond.

services.name: Human Immortalized Cell Culture
services.description: For requesting human cells Cell Lines typically refer to legacy immortalised cells, that can be cultured and passaged “indefinitely” Primary Cells are cells that have been isolated from fresh tissue (or cultures) that have not be immortalised and after a certain amount of passaging they will reach senescence. iPSCs, induced pluripotent stem cells, are cells that have (through GM or culturing conditions) have been revert back to the pluripotency state. The original cells can be a cell line or a primary cell.

title: Europe, Middle East & Africa Clinical Research (EMEACR)
description: Europe, Middle East & Africa Clinical Research (EMEACR) is a trailblazing Clinical Research Organization (CRO) that operates from the vibrant city of Dubai. Despite its modest size, EMEACR casts a wide net, providing full-scale clinical research services across the expansive EMEA region. With a keen understanding of the pharmaceutical, biotechnology, and medical device sectors, we have honed our expertise to help our clients fast-track their time-to-market. Our ultimate goal is to facilitate the delivery of safe and efficacious treatments to a global patient population. We are driven by an unwavering commitment to those who need them most, establishing EMEACR as an integral player in the quest for better healthcare solutions.

sites.name: Europe, Middle East & Africa Clinical Research (EMEACR)

title: Gulf Medical University
description: Gulf Medical University, located in the heart of Ajman, United Arab Emirates, is an esteemed academic core facility that is committed to fostering a culture of excellence and innovation in the field of healthcare education. Although the year of its establishment is not specified, this distinguished institution has made significant strides in the academic realm. With a focus on a broad range of medical and health science disciplines, Gulf Medical University stands as a beacon of knowledge and advancement in Ajman. The University not only serves Ajman but it also attracts aspiring medical professionals from all over the world, thus creating a diverse and dynamic educational environment. As a key player in the academic landscape, Gulf Medical University continues to make a positive impact on the healthcare sector, one student at a time.

sites.name: Gulf Medical University

title: Getz Pharma Research
description: Founded in 2006, Getz Pharma Research is a thriving small-scale enterprise headquartered in the vibrant city of Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Also extending its footprint to Karachi, Pakistan, our company's reach is both local and global. We specialize in offering a comprehensive suite of services including impurity profiling, stability testing, active pharmaceutical ingredient (API) formulation development, characterization, and screening. With a keen focus on enhancing the quality of pharmaceutical products, our dedicated team is committed to delivering top-notch solutions that cater to the dynamic needs of the pharmaceutical industry. Over the years, our revenue has consistently grown, now standing at an impressive 1-10 million TTM, a testament to our unwavering commitment to excellence. At Getz Pharma Research, we strive to innovate, excel and lead in the realm of pharmaceutical research, delivering unmatched value to our clients across the globe.
